short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention cleans your cookie cash and browser history in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove your browser history/cache/cookie and e.t.c. in one click!

You can choose:

Time - 30/60/90/All cleaning period.
Cash/Cookie - if 'Yes' - deleting.

*notes:
Default settings - 30 minutes, cache/cookie 'No'
